tag_list: limousine, limousine-service, town-car, los-angeles-limousine, new-york-limousine, san-francisco-limousine, miami-limousine, las-vegas-limousine, philadelphia-limousine, chicago-limousine, minneapolis-st--paul-limousine, austin-limousine, and-washington-d
overview: Derek Matjeka is the president and CEO of SLS Worldwide Transportation, an international luxury transportation firm that specializes in providing volume luxury transportation to corporate accounts worldwide. SLS Worldwide manages limousine, town car, SUV, luxury van, shuttles, and coach lines throughout the United States from their regional offices in Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Miami, Las Vegas, Philadelphia, Chicago, Minneapolis-St. Paul, Austin, and Washington DC.
